text: Rapid induction of antigen-specific CD4+ T cells guides coordinated humoral & cellular immune responses to #coronavirus mRNA #vaccine https://t.co/HyG2zMglCX. Effect in people w/o prior #covid19 but ONLY LITTLE impact on T cell respone after 1 dose in people with prior #covid_19 https://t.co/TryYLtCL2R
